simpledb

Class LockManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • simpledb.LockManager

  • public class LockManager
extends java.lang.Object
    LockManager is class which manages locks for transactions. It stores states of various locks on pages and provides atomic grant and release of locks.
    Author:
    hrishi

      • holdsLock

        public boolean holdsLock(TransactionId tid,
                         PageId pid)
        Checks if transaction has lock on a page
        Parameters:
        tid - Transaction Id
        pid - Page Id
        Returns:
        boolean True if holds lock

      • grantLock

        public boolean grantLock(TransactionId tid,
                         PageId pid,
                         Permissions pm)
        Grants lock to the Transaction.
        Parameters:
        tid - TransactionId requesting lock.
        pid - PageId on which the lock is requested.
        pm - The type of permission.
        Returns:
        boolean True if lock is successfully granted.

      • releaseLock

        public void releaseLock(TransactionId tid,
                        PageId pid)
        Releases locks associated with given transaction and page.
        Parameters:
        tid - The TransactionId.
        pid - The PageId.
